scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Dianna
scrape.text: 3.5 stars.This book is certainly not for everyone, as the reviews testify. Not my usual genre but I did find it interesting. Even though there were no likeable characters, I couldn’t put the book down. Taking place in a noisy, snobbish restaurant, the 2 couples get together to discuss what they are going to do about their children’s dilemma. The flashbacks helped the reader understand that dilemma in bits and pieces. In the end, how far would you go to protect your children? Continue reading The Dinner and find out...
